name: Core Guardian
description:
Your job is to take care of Core and ensure its well being.

 Collect resources and do many strange things, most of which help the Core to ''pulse''

Controls

WASD and Arrow keys  -  Movement

Crafting  -  Mouse

Jooa Järviluoma  -  Everything

Irene Pasanen  -  Art

Hilkka Hytönen  -  Code, Art

Theme: Aetherpunk
